seniority_level.evidence: Title is 'Data Engineer' without senior/staff designation, no years experience specified, but requires hands-on Databricks and cloud experience suggesting mid-level

job_family.evidence: Job title explicitly states 'Data Engineer', responsibilities focus on ETL/ELT pipelines, data modeling, and cloud data platforms

sub_specialty.evidence: Heavy emphasis on Delta Lakehouse architectures, Delta Live Tables, and Unity Catalog - core lakehouse technologies

leadership_expectation.evidence: No mention of people management, team leadership, or architectural oversight beyond individual pipelines; collaboration with data scientists is peer-level

primary_cloud.evidence: Job title specifies 'Azure', and responsibilities mention Azure services (ADF, Synapse, ADLS) alongside AWS as secondary option

secondary_clouds.evidence: AWS mentioned as alternative platform ('Azure or AWS') and AWS services (Glue, S3, Redshift) listed as part of required experience

processing_paradigm.evidence: Mentions both real-time/batch ingestion (Auto Loader) and batch pipelines; streaming is 'nice to have' but not primary focus

orchestrator_category.evidence: Primary orchestration through Databricks (Delta Live Tables, Auto Loader, cluster/job management) which is Spark-native

storage_layer.evidence: Explicit focus on Delta Lakehouse architectures, Unity Catalog for governance, and cloud storage (ADLS/S3) as foundational layer

remote_restriction.evidence: Location specified as 'Mumbai Metropolitan Region' with no mention of remote flexibility, implying regional requirement

timezone_focus.evidence: Location restricted to Mumbai, India, indicating country-specific timezone focus

relocation_required.evidence: Location specified as Mumbai Metropolitan Region with no remote option mentioned, implying relocation may be required

h1b_friendly.evidence: No visa sponsorship mentioned, and location is Mumbai (India), suggesting local hiring only

opt_cpt_friendly.evidence: Location in India and no mention of student visa support implies not OPT/CPT friendly

citizenship_required.evidence: No citizenship requirement stated, but location in India implies authorization to work in India is required

w2_vs_1099.evidence: IBM Consulting is a large enterprise with standard employment practices; no contract types mentioned suggests full-time W2 employee

benefits_level.evidence: Company description mentions 'long-term career growth' and 'development opportunities' but no specific premium benefits like equity or unlimited PTO

growth_path_clarity.evidence: Company description mentions 'long-term career growth and development opportunities' but no specific tracks or promotion paths

mentorship_signals.evidence: Mentions 'collaboration with clients' and 'work with visionaries' but no formal mentorship program; working with senior staff is implied

promotion_path_mentioned.evidence: No explicit mention of promotions, advancement, or career progression paths in the job description

internal_mobility_mentioned.evidence: No mention of internal transfers, lateral moves, or exploring other roles within IBM

career_tracks_available.evidence: No specific career tracks (IC, management, architect) mentioned in the job description or company description

requirement_strictness.evidence: Clear distinction between mandatory skills (Databricks, PySpark, Delta Lake) and nice-to-haves (Kafka, REST APIs), suggesting balanced requirements

scope_definition.evidence: Focused on data engineering with specific technologies (Databricks, Azure/AWS) and responsibilities (pipelines, modeling, dashboards)

skill_inflation_detected.evidence: Skills required (Databricks, PySpark, SQL, cloud services) are reasonable for a mid-level data engineer role; no unrealistic combinations
